scripts.genhello: npm run beaker -- generate --local src/examples/hello/hello.json src/examples/hello/
scripts.genstructer: npm run beaker -- generate --local src/examples/struct/structer.json src/examples/struct/
scripts.genopup: npm run beaker -- generate --local src/examples/opup/opup.json src/examples/opup/
scripts.genamm: npm run beaker -- generate --local src/examples/amm/amm.json src/examples/amm/
scripts.genavm7: npm run beaker -- generate --local src/examples/demo_avm7/demo_avm7.json src/examples/demo_avm7/
scripts.regen: npm run genhello && npm run genstructer && npm run genopup && npm run genavm7
